2a1(mdo sde): ar+ya ta ga
2a2(mdo sde): ma hA ka ru na ni de sha na ma mag yan
2b1(mdo sde): su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs
2b2(mdo sde): pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pa/ zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//
2b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phag 'tshal
3a1(mdo sde): lo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
3a2(mdo sde): gcig na/ rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril sngon rgyal ba
3a3(mdo sde): bzhugs bzhugs pa/ mchod rten chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i
3b1(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs pa/ sa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sa mngon par bstod pa/ cho ga
3b2(mdo sde): kyi bdan lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin gyis phyag byas pa'i
3b3(mdo sde): sa phyogs dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskul ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba/ chos
3b4(mdo sde): kyi sgo mngon par brjod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba/ yon tan tshad med pa
4a1(mdo sde): las yang dag par 'byung ba/ da bzhin gshegs pa'i nga
4a2(mdo sde): yul na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs
4a3(mdo sde): rgyas/ chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor/ slob ma shin tu dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tshogs
4a4(mdo sde): ni mnga'/ chos thams cad la mnga' dbang ni bsnyes/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa
4b1(mdo sde): bsgrub pa ni legs par mkhyed/ dbang po dpa pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzhen/
4b2(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi bag chags kyi 'tshams sbyor ba legs par 'joms pa ni mkhas/ sangs rgya
4b3(mdo sde): kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa ni rgyun mi 'chad cing / dge slong phrag drug bcu'i dge slong gi dge
4b4(mdo sde): 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang cang shes pa/ glang po chen po bya
4b5(mdo sde): byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur po ga/ bdag gi don rjes su thod pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyo
5a1(mdo sde): yongs su pa ga/ yang dag pa'i shes pas/ snun
5a2(mdo sde): tu rnam par grol ba/ shesar shin tu rnam par grol ba/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi
5a3(mdo sde): sbyor ba thams cad legs par bcom pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ chos
5a4(mdo sde): zab mo la gnas par mkhas pa/ dmigs pa'i chos kyis nges par byung ba/ spyod lam mdzes
5a5(mdo sde): pa/ phun sum tshogs pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas chen por gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs po'i bka' la
5b1(mdo sde): shin tu zhugs pa sha stag go// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang yang thabs cig ste/ byang chub
5b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa/ chags pa med pa'i spyod yul gyis nges par 'byung ba/ byams pa
5b3(mdo sde): chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i chos kyi sprin las lhag mthong dang rigs pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i glog phyung zhing / bdud
5b4(mdo sde): rtsi'i chu'i rgyun gyi char 'bebs pas/ 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa/ sems can thams cad la sems dang mnam/
5b5(mdo sde): pa/ rjes su chags pa/ khong khro ba dang / bral ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sna tshogs kyi lo tog ni yang dag par
5b6(mdo sde): 'phel bar byed pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bas lhag pa'i shes rab kyi 'od zer rab tu gtong bas/ gti mug gi mun pa sel
6a1(mdo sde): pa'i las gyi snang bathab pa kun tu ston pa dang / salas can gyi bdaga' 'byung ba dang /
6a2(mdo sde): rtsab yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sred pa'i chu ba skems pa dang / shes pa'i las kyi mtha' la rab tu 'jog pa la mngon par
6a3(mdo sde): shes pa chen po dang zhi gnas kyi sgru ba lta bun 'gro ba thams cad la sems mnyam pas/ mngon par dazhi bar bya ba'i bsam pa tshim
6a4(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pa'i 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba kun tu ston pa/ ri rab lta bu'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i tshangs pa'i
6a5(mdo sde): gnas pa'i rin po che shin tu brtan te/ ngos bzhi nas yul gyi rlung thams cad kyis mi bskul cing / 'jig rten gyi chos las
6a6(mdo sde): mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun tu bstan pa snang bar gyur pa/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar gzungs dang dran pa'i
6b1(mdo sde): snod rgya chen po chos kyi chus yongs su gang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rin po ches 'gro ba thams cad nye bar mchog
6b2(mdo sde): ri dgas kyi rgyal po ltar bden pa'i rkang pa dang / byams pa rab tu 'phel ba'i 'jug ma dang / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi mig dang
6b3(mdo sde): ldan zhing chos zab mo la skrag pa med pas/ pha rol rgol ba thams cad 'joms pa/ bskal pa brgya stong phrag dpag tu med cing /
6b4(mdo sde): mtha' yas thug pa med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun bcad pas/ yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa sha stag dang tha
6b5(mdo sde): cig pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas snang zhing sgrub pa med par lta ba zhes bya ba dang / byang /
6b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhing thams cad kyi brgyan pa bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems
7a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ba'i spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang /
7a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod lam thams cad kyis 'dul ba mi 'khrugs pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba dang / byang
7a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i tog gi rgyal mtshan rnam par sprul pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang /
7a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser bzang po bsags 'od kyi gzi brjid kyi 'od zer ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems
7a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis rnam par nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
7a6(mdo sde): chen po bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pas brtan pas bsags pa zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa byang chub
7a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang thabs cig go// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
7b1(mdo sde): dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon par
7b2(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo bcu drug pa zhes te/ tshangs par spyod pa rgyas par gyur par mkhyen/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po de yang gzigs shing
7b3(mdo sde): mkhyen te/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin par mkhyen nas/ 'di snyam du gang gi phyir ngas byang chub
7b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgya cher rjes su yongs su bzung ba dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la bzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin
7b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba'i sgrib pa med pa'i
7b6(mdo sde): sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par snyan par bya'o snyam du dgongs so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par
7b7(mdo sde): sprul pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par
7b8(mdo sde): sprul pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba de la snyoms par bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par
8a1(mdo sde): sprul pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs pa thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong ni
8a2(mdo sde): bar snang la 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi bar du 'khor gyi khyams/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon par
8a3(mdo sde): grub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnang bar byed pa/ sems can tshad med pa'i bsam pa tshim
8a4(mdo sde): par byed pa lha'i gzhal med khang thams cad zil gyis gnon pa/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bskul ba/ bzhi bai DUr+ya dkar po'i dbyibs
8a5(mdo sde): dang 'dzam bu gling gi gser gyi khang pa dag dang / dpal gyi snying po'i rta babs dag dang / rin po che rdo'i snying po'i sgo khang dag dang / nor bu rin po che snying po'i kha khyer
8a6(mdo sde): ngag dang / rin po che dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi stegs bu dag dang / rin po che kun nas 'od kyi khang pa brtsegs pa dag dang / rin po che thams cad kyi dag pa dang / mu
8a7(mdo sde): tig gi zeng rab tu sbyangs pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sbeng ba dang / lha'i der gyi lnga lnga mngon par sbyangs pas bsngags pa snyan pa
8a8(mdo sde): dpag tu med cing thug pa med pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam zhig byung ste/ 'khor gyi khyams de yang tsan dan sbrul gyi
8b1(mdo sde): gling kyis bzlas ga can da dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i dri ying du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ drang mtshag sa ka ngas pa'i rnyeng thal gdugs pa/ klub su takA dang /
8b2(mdo sde): rin po che'i me tog gis rnam par sbas pa/ me tog sil ma bkram pa/ rin po che'i shing dang / rin po che'i mkha' rten gyis mdzes par byas pa ste/ phyogs
8b3(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na brgyan mdzes pa bkod pa ji srid pa de dag thams cad 'khor gyi khyams de nyid na kun tu snang ngo // der seng ge'i khri bye ba
8b4(mdo sde): khrig khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dpag tu med pa grangs med pa/ sna tshogs pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mtho ba/ rab tu bzang ba/ yangs pa/ rgya che ba/ yid du
8b5(mdo sde): 'ong ba/ yid dga' bar byed pa dag byung bar gyur to// gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir them skas kha khyer mi bdun gyi 'phang tsam gyis bskor ba/ brgyar
8b6(mdo sde): dpag tshad byed kyis yongs su bzung ba/ rin po che an d+ha rnyil dang / 'thon ka chen pos snying por gyur pa/ brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i
8b7(mdo sde): gdugs can/ tshangs pa'i na tse 'am ci dang rin po che ser pos smras pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba kun tu bskyod pas sgra 'byung ba/ sa'i steng nas 'kha
8b8(mdo sde): kyi khyams la thug gi bar du gyen du mngon par 'phags pa/ drang ba/ ma yo ba/ bzhi stong byung bar gyur to// gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba
9a1(mdo sde): bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams cad du yang de lta bu'i them
9a2(mdo sde): skas chen po dag byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin
9a3(mdo sde): de las bzhengs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnams rnam pa drug tu g.yos te snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom
9a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs dang / thabs cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / nyan thos kyi
9a5(mdo sde): tshegs kyis mdun du bdar te/ lha dang klus mngon par bstod cing me tog gi char chen po ni 'bebs/ na bza'i char chen pos ni mngon par 'gebs/ phye ma dang spos
9a6(mdo sde): dang byug pa'i char chen po ni 'thor/ sil snyan dang sgra dbyangs chen po ni rab tu sgrogs/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa ni rab tu g.yo bar mdzad/ 'jig
9a7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams grangs med pa ni snang bar mdzad/ sangs rgyas mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs
9a8(mdo sde): rgyas kyi khyu mchog du gyur pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin chen po dang /
9b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen thos bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las mi ldang bar gyur to// wA dang / kA dang / gnad sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / rnam pa
9b2(mdo sde): rdzing dang / mi'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po bye ba phrag du ma nam ring du 'breng zhing nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi thamaskas kyi dbus na/ 'khor gyi thams bkod zan
9b3(mdo sde): bder gshegs so// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su bzhugs par rig nas/ bcom
9b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ lha'i me tog gi sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ nyi zla me dang nor
9b5(mdo sde): bu'i 'od dang lha yul pa'i lha 'od shin tu dri ma med pa ltad/ thub pas 'od kyis thams cad zil gnan nas ngan song gsum po dag kyang zhi bar mdzad/ ri bo lhun po dang
9b6(mdo sde): ni kho ra khor yug rtse mo bsnyil te zhing rnams gsal bar gyur pas na/ dga' zhing yid rnams mgu nas don rnams thams cad grub pa'i rgyal ba la ni skyabasu mchi/
9b7(mdo sde): de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i zham ring du 'brang ngo //
9b8(mdo sde): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su bzhugs par gnas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i
10a1(mdo sde): galas kyi khyer gA'i bras kyi n+dan gyi chang rab tu babs bral bsgyur nas bcom ldan 'das la mngod par sto ga rdzu 'phrul dpapa bzhis
10a2(mdo sde): shing rab tu mtshungs pa med pa rnam par 'phrul pa shin du ston/ rgyal ba zhi ma ji bzhin 'phags te zhing rnams bye ba brgya dag du yang rab tu gda'/ rgyal bas rang gis
10a3(mdo sde): yon tan kun gyis zhing rnams thams cad brgyan te shin du mdzes mdzad pa// gang zhig shin du mnyam med mtshungs pa med cing rdzu 'phrul dbang du gyur la phyag 'tshal lo//
10a4(mdo sde): de nas sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa 'dis mngon par stod nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis zham ring du 'brang ngo // de nas
10a5(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po rab 'thab bral la sogs pa 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las
10a6(mdo sde): kyi phyir/ lha'i na bza'i sprin gyi char rab tu phab te/ thal mo sbyar ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ bde gshegs khyod kyi mkhyen pa
10a7(mdo sde): mtha' yas yangs pas sems can bsam pa mkhyen// mkha' 'dra'i lam gyi rnam gsum dag la chags med thams cad mkhyen pa nyid// sems kyi 'jug pa
10a8(mdo sde): gcig gis 'gro ba'i sems kyi spyod pa thams cad mkhyen// de nas nas srid pa gsum po dag na lus can rnams kyis mchod par 'os// de nas 'thab bral gyi lha
10b1(mdo sde): rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das latshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bkod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nam ring du 'brang bar zur to// de nas lha'i rnam ma
10b2(mdo sde): dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su bzhugs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/
10b3(mdo sde): lha'i rin po che'i sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces mngon par stong pa/ gang gi slad du sgra dang yi ge ma mchis
10b4(mdo sde): gang du'ang rgyu ba ma mchis pas/ khyod kyis chos rnams mi g.yo ya brla dang sgyu ma'i smig rgyu 'drar mkhyen nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rjes sems can rnams
10b5(mdo sde): la ched du chos mchog gsungs pas na// chos kyi dngos po'i rang bzhin mkhas pa bdag med gsung ba'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas dga' ldan gyis lha rnams
10b6(mdo sde): kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'brang ngo // de nas lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul la sogs pa
10b7(mdo sde): 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das theb skas su bzhugs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i rgyan gyi char rab tu phab ste thal
10b8(mdo sde): sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do// chos kyi zong gi rang gi stobs bcu mkha' 'dra 'od zer ldan pa dang / thugs rje ba rnyes
11a1(mdo sde): nas byams pa'i dgangs pasasems can rnams la gzugs s+ho ga/ b+hU num tshas la gnyis su mang par zhugs kyang rgyal pa dzud
11a2(mdo sde): par mkhyen/ chos kyi khyad par sems lhag don kun grub pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa
11a3(mdo sde): 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'brang bar gyur to// de nas lha'i dbang po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis/
11a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das them skas su bzhugs pa dang / 'khor gyi khyams su mngon par phyogs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal gyi sprin gyi char rab tu
11a5(mdo sde): phab ste/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// tshul khrims dri ma mi mnga' rnam dag rnam par nges pa dam pa'i
11a6(mdo sde): ting 'dzin mchog mi g.yo// mnyam med blo ldan mtsho 'dra gnas shi srid las rnam grol dbang sgyur zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// rim gyis byams dang ldan pa'i thugs rje
11a7(mdo sde): yis ni bden pa'i lam gyi rnams la rab tu gnas mdzad pa// rnam thar gsum gyi lam gyis khyim na gnas pa'i bde gshegs seng ge khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/ snying rje'i chu bo/
11a8(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phel/ zhi gnas 'dab ma rnam par grol ba'i me tog rgyas// slob pa'i tshogs kyi bung bas nges par brnyen gyur pa// bde gshegs par
11a9(mdo sde): com ldan 'das la mchod pa'i la
11b1(mdo sde): ba'an rgya byag 'tshal lo// nga bgags pas chug ma pa gnas pagan gru sa pa gas
11b2(mdo sde): kyi rlung rnams yangs pa chen pas mi gsos pa// sangs rgyas bangs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mnga' bdag zugs rjes dbyangs kyi dkyil gabang nam dag ga/ thog ci
11b3(mdo sde): blo mchog gis ni rab tu 'joms mdzad pa// sems can brgya dag gis ni mang pos mang pos mchod gyur pa// bde gshegs zla ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
11b4(mdo sde): mkha' ltar zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa'i lam gshegs pa// shes rab 'od kyis phyogs bcu dag ni rgyas 'gengs shing // skye bo mang po mtshungs med pad ma kha 'byed pa/
11b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nyi ma dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mnga' bdag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gsum po dag na yang / 'dren pa khyod dang mnyam pa dmigs par ma gyur te/
11b6(mdo sde): khyod ni yon tan kun gyis yang dag grub pa lags// bdag cag khyod la stod pas ngoms par gyur ma lags// lha dang klu dang lha ma yin gyis phyag bgyis pa// lha
11b7(mdo sde): mchog brgya dag gis kyang yang dag mngon stod la// bsngags pa brgya phrag mang pos yang dag mngon par stod// bde bar gshegs pa stong 'od khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
11b8(mdo sde): de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi nam ring du
12a1(mdo sde): 'brang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das de ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa chad med pas lha 'bum gyis mngon par bstod nas/ 29
12a2(mdo sde): gyi khyams rin po che bkod par gshegs te/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'dir/ them skas 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod
12a3(mdo sde): par gshegs pa bzhin du/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams cad na yang gshegs par shes so//
12a4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams stong gsum gyis yongs su bzung ba rin po che bkod par seng ge'i khri ltar bshams pa la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa'
12a5(mdo sde): dang nyan thos chen po dag kyang stan ci rigs la 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe// sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa/
12a6(mdo sde): la sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la snyom par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par thar pa'i sgrib pa med pa la sangs rgyas rnam par
12a7(mdo sde): rol pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs ma dag du/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i sku'i khung bu thams cad kyi sku'i khung bu re re nas kyang 'od zer gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed /
12a8(mdo sde): byung ste/ byung nas kyang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas so// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs rnams dang / 'og dang /
12b1(mdo sde): ded dang / phyogs mtsham sa rnams kyi 'ag rten gyi khams thams cad ldang ba byas so// lagazhan gyi khams rnams drang ba dbyas pa bas tu rnamasapas can sa
12b2(mdo sde): pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kyi rgyun cad de// dung 'gra'i sbyiganas pa'i sems can rnams dang / gshin rdu la ga na
12b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yang rgyun chad do// sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la 'dod chags kyis gnod par ma gyur cing // zhe sdang gis ma
12b4(mdo sde): yin/ gti mug gis ma yin te/ nyon mongs pa gzhan gyis kyang gnod par ma gyur to// de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / ba ma lta bu'i
12b5(mdo sde): 'du shes su gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di
12b6(mdo sde): dag byung ngo // gang gis brtson 'grus stobs ni mtha' yas yangs pa btan pa brtsams gyur te/ gang gis brtson 'grus chen po'i stobs kyis bskal pa dag las
12b7(mdo sde): phyir phyogs spangs// gang gi yon tan dag ni phyogs bcu rnams ni mthu ldan rab brjod pa// shAkya thub pa'i 'od yangs 'gro ba thams cad snang ba byed pa mdzes/
12b8(mdo sde): gang cho ga rgya chen bla med mnyam sA de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ mkhas pa'i blo gros brtan pa dag ni bskal pa grangs med dpag tu nyan/ blo rgyas gang zhig rdzogs pa'i
13a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa tshim skyed pa/ thub pa des ni gang phyir sems can bde bar bzhed pas 'od ni byung / mnga' bdag gang zhig
13a2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus kyis ni bdud stobs mu stegs chogs bcas pham mdzad pa/ pad ma byung ba bzhid du 'phags shing phyogs bcu dag tu lhun po ji bzhin mdzes/ gang
13a3(mdo sde): zhig nyi ma bzhin du sku'i 'od kyis 'gro ba ma lus snang mdzad pa/ de'i chos kyi 'khor lo bzhag pa don chen gsan du rgyal ba gshegs su gsol// rab tu bskor bar
13a4(mdo sde): ma gyur mtshungs pa med cing rgyal ba kun gyis bskor gyur pa/ 'khor lo dam pa stobs bcu sems can thugs brtse phyir ni di ring bskor bar mdzad/ srog chags rnam
13a5(mdo sde): kyis bsten par rnyed dka' legs pa rgya chen de ring 'byung bar 'gyur// gang dag dad pa dang ba che yangs don du gnyer ba de dag de ring ltos// de nas 'od zer de dag gis
13a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis go bar byas// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bskul/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams
13a7(mdo sde): cad rab tu g.yo bar byas/ sems can thams cad bde bar byas/ nyon mongs pa'i khams thams cad rnam par sbyangs/ mun pa mun nag thams cad bsal/ bdud
13a8(mdo sde): kyi khyim thams cad mog mog por byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du slar 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das
13b1(mdo sde): kyi bu'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to// de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dri med nam dag rin chen 'od byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i chos rgyun mi 'chad pa'i 'ong/
13b2(mdo sde): zer bkod pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rin po che'i bsod nams bkod pas rgya che ba dang ldan pa na/ byang chub sems
13b3(mdo sde): dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba 'ong des bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su
13b4(mdo sde): bskor cing mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin to//
13b5(mdo sde): 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas// des bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan khri bskor
13b6(mdo sde): ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'chod pa'i las kyi phyir/ nga/ lha'i nor bu bai DUr+ya 'dra ba'i char rab tu phab ste/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis
13b7(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan 'das rab tu mtshungs med yon tan pha rol phyin/ khyod kyi yon tan bsngags phreng phyogs bcu kun na brjod/ khyod kyi yon tan tshags
13b8(mdo sde): rnams mchis zhing gang na yon gter// der ni chos ston gnyer ba bdag cag rab tu mchi// chos dbyings mnyam nyid rnam rtog ma mchis ji bzhin du/ bcom ldan dri med
14a1(mdo sde): 'od kyis mnyam pa nyid mkhyen kyang / shin du bslabs pa'i sgyum mkhan ltar chos kyi rgyal// sems can rnam par grol spang bad
14a2(mdo sde): bstan pa mdzad// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis// bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ shar
14a3(mdo sde): phyogs logs na gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi bstobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha'
14a4(mdo sde): yas rin chen spobs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa na byang chub sems dpa' rin chen srog shing zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu
14a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te// lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad
14a6(mdo sde): cig thang cig yud tsam de las 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom
14a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing / gser gyi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la
14a8(mdo sde): mngon par bkab te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// bcom lnga thugs rje sprin gyis 'jig rten rgyas bkang nas/
14b1(mdo sde): 'od kyi sgog phyung stong pa bdag med spags te// yan lag brgyad pa'i lam gyi chu yis ni mdzad cing // dkar po'i stobs dbang nags tshal ses pa 'phel bar
14b2(mdo sde): mdzad// bde gshegs shes rab 'od kyis gti mug rab gsal nas/ ring nas srid mtshor gnyid log sems can sad mdzad de/ lam yangs bstan cing
14b3(mdo sde): sred pa dag kyang skam par mdzad/ thar pa'i grong gnas rnams kyis mig kyang rnam par spyod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i
14b4(mdo sde): bstod pa tshad med pa// dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas// lho phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang
14b5(mdo sde): rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas nub phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba dang ldan pa na/ byang chub
14b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sgra bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu// byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i klung bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing /
14b7(mdo sde): mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor/
14b8(mdo sde): gyi khyims rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug nas/ denas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la man pas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'a
15a1(mdo sde): na 'a/ na das da / da d+hA shAn d+hA
15a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan padas la mdzan par bathozod // khyong kyi tshu badzin pas rnam mala' khams /
15a3(mdo sde): zhing smon lam dge bas dag pa bye ba phrag mang ldan// dri med rnam par dag cing zag pa med pa des/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsam gyis
15a4(mdo sde): mi khyab gsal/ khyod kyi tshig ni rgyun chags gsal zhing mtshungs pa ste// 'gro ba bsam dag bsam pa mnyam nyid yongs su tshim bgyid pa// sems kyi rgyu
15a5(mdo sde): dang rnam tog gang yang mi mnga' yang // sems can bsam pa rnams la rgyal ba dag gis 'byung // de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems
15a6(mdo sde): dpa'i bstod pa tshad pa med pa des dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ nub phyogs logs su gnas ste/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis
15a7(mdo sde): sprul pa'i rang rang gi bstan dag la 'khod do// de nas byang phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin chen spobs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig
15a8(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyis smras pa na// byang chub sems dpa' blo mchog rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'od des bskal ma thag tu/ byang chub sems
15b1(mdo sde): dpa' gang gi'i klung bcu'i byes snyed kyis yongs su bskur cing mdun du bdang te/ ldan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skang cig tha
15b2(mdo sde): cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ de das bcom
15b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon pa'i las byed cing nor bu'i ngo
15b4(mdo sde): sha la dang / rin po che'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do//
15b5(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i chu gser bco ma lta bur ser ba'i sku// kun nas spyan mnga' phyogs bcu dag tu rnam par mdzes// mtshungs med sku la sems can gang dag nges
15b6(mdo sde): rtog pa// de dag gyon med bde zhing dga' ba thob par 'gyur/ gang gis lhun po rtsegs pa lta bu'i khrun tsam du/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa mtshungs med rgyal
15b7(mdo sde): bltas kyang ni/ de yis rdzu 'phrul kun gyi stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi rnam par sprul pas rgyal ba'i spyig tsug mthong mi nus// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de
15b8(mdo sde): ngag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas byang phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la
16a1(mdo sde): 'khong ngo // de nas shang dang lha'i mtshams phyogs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa myang ngan thams cad bcom pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten/
16a2(mdo sde): gyi khams mya ngan med pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag du/ byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye snyed kyis yongs
16a3(mdo sde): su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'dir phyin te/
16a4(mdo sde): 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug nas de sa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la
16a5(mdo sde): lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing rin po che'i dra bas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
16a6(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// spu yis mtha' dpung ma mchis pa'i zhing 'dzin kyang / sems can rnams la mi gnod zhing la mi gnod pas// mig med
16a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis rgyal ba'i spyod yul 'tshal bar dka'/ sangs rgyas sras ni rgyal ba'i byin gyis yang dag 'tshal// zhing cig phyogs la zhing mang rab 'byam ston mdzad de// kun tu
16a8(mdo sde): bstan kyang rnam par 'phel dang 'grib ma mchis/ bsam pa chen po dag dang ldan ci 'drar gyur de la ni dpag med rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pas de bston do// de nas byang chub
16b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bzod nas shir dang / rtswa phyogs patshams tshogs su gnas rga
16b2(mdo sde): rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas lho dang / nub kyi mtshams phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen pos sems can thams
16b3(mdo sde): cad la gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mig bzang po na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'od des bskal ma thag tu/ byang chub
16b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig
16b5(mdo sde): yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyis zhab
16b6(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing na bza'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
16b7(mdo sde): bkab te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// sems can dam pa g.yag rnga thogs pa ji bzhin du// tshul khrims med gzigs
16b8(mdo sde): mgon po shin tu thugs rje zhing // bdag la bstod pa mi mdzad gzhan la spong mi mdzad// lhun po ji bzhin khyod brtan bla ma rgya chen ston// chu gter zab mo bzhin du gting
16b9(mdo sde): tshul khribs dri med nor za chen 'dra ba bsru
17a1(mdo sde): shin gting dpag dka'// srid pa dog pa bcings pa kun nas grol ba ste// sems can khrag khrig nyes pa chen pos bcings las grol// de nas byang chub
17a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su gnas te/ rang
17a3(mdo sde): gis rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi bstan dag la 'khod do// de nas nub dang byang gi mtshams phyogs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'ong bkod pa'i rgyal ba'i sangs
17a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mun pa dang bral ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dra ba can zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i klung
17a5(mdo sde): bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi kham
17a6(mdo sde): mi 'jed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
17a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing rgyan gyi dra bas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su
17a8(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// srid pa'i rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rtogs mdzad nas// byed pa sgyu ma lta bu'i dngos po med par ston//
17b1(mdo sde): sgyu ma lta bu'i sems can khams ni 'dul mdzad kyang // 'di na sems can rang bzhin ma mchis khams ma mchis// dper na mi zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na// gzug
17b2(mdo sde): mthong yang dag 'du shes de bzhin mthong ma lags/ 'dus byas dngos po ma mchis rmi lam 'dra bar gsung / chos rnams snang yang 'di na chos la chags ma mchis//
17b3(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas nub dang byang gi phyogs logs
17b4(mdo sde): su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi bstan dag la 'khod do// de nas byang dang shar gyi mtshams phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i
17b5(mdo sde): dkyil dri ma med par rnam par sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yongs dag dri ma med par rab tu gnas pa nas byang chub sems dpa' blo mtha' yas dri
17b6(mdo sde): med ces bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas
17b7(mdo sde): kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan
17b8(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mag zas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan
18a1(mdo sde): 'das la bcad pa'i las byed cing nag tu 'byung ba'i sel gan sa dra bas bcom ldan 'das la ba da bar bka' ste/ rigs su dag
18a2(mdo sde): 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// zab mo chos la mkhas shing rab tu zhil mos/ khyod kyis chos kun stong zhing mtshan ma med par mkhyen/ khyod kyis
18a3(mdo sde): thugs kyi dgongs pa 'jig rten kun ma 'tshal// mtha' yas blo mnga' sems kyi bsam pa cho ga mkhyen/ sems can cig gi spyod bzhin sems can kun gyi spyod/ gang dag dus
18a4(mdo sde): gsum ldan pa de dag khyod kyis mkhyen/ sems can 'du shes mi 'jug sems kyi 'du shes min// 'du shes yongs shes mkhas shing mnyam pa nyid dang ldan// de nas byang chub
18a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su gnas
18a6(mdo sde): te rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas 'og gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che ud pa la dmar po'i dpal gyi yang
18a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang byed du snang ba na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu// byang chub sems
18a8(mdo sde): dpa'i gang ga'i klung bcu'i byam snyed kyim mings su bam cing bdun du bad te/ spyan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi ning de nas mi snang bar gyur nas// skad cig thang cig sung
18b1(mdo sde): c+doMs kyi mams la bgo 'os phyag 'tshal
18b2(mdo sde): 'atsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'dir byin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug nas/ nges bcom ldan 'das
18b3(mdo sde): ya lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed cing nor bu rin po che'i gling gi phreng ba'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshogs
18b4(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// gal te khrag khrig zhing na ji snyed rngul mchis pa// de snyed bde gshegs sras po rgyal ba'i drung
18b5(mdo sde): lhag te// bskal pa bye ba stong mang zhu ba zhus pa dag/ de dag thams cad tshigs cig dus kyis go bar mdzad// blo la mkhas pa rab rdzogs shes rab shin tu
18b6(mdo sde): rdzogs gzungs dang ting 'dzin rab rdzogs bsod nams mtha' yas te/ bskal pa mang po mtha' yas bsngags pa rab brjod kyang / ska rtses rgya mtsho ji bzhin
18b7(mdo sde): zad par mi nus so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas 'og
18b8(mdo sde): gis phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi bstan dag la 'khod do// de nas steng gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa sgra bsgrags
18b9(mdo sde): mchog gi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan gyis brgyan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'ong
19a1(mdo sde): des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu mang /
19a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan
19a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan
19a4(mdo sde): 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing rgyan thams cad bkod pa dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bka ba ste/ tshigs su bcad
19a5(mdo sde): pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// bde gshegs sku'i 'phrin las mtha' dang dpung ma mchis// bla med rnams kyi sa gsung thugs spyod
19a6(mdo sde): yul mtha' yas pa// de ni sangs rgyas mkhyen gyi sems can gzhan gyis min// dper na mkha'i mtha' ma skye bos mi rnyeng bzhin/ mtshungs med spyod pa mtha'
19a7(mdo sde): dpung med pa ji bzhin du/ byang chub 'khor lo de bzhin 'on te mya ngan 'das// sa bon ji bzhin de ltar 'bras bu 'byung ba ltar// de bzhin phyogs bcur rgyal ba'i gnas
19a8(mdo sde): kyang tshad ma mchis// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ steng gi bar
19b1(mdo sde): sdang la dong ste/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod ngo do// de ltar phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu 'dus pa la sogs pa byung
19b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dag gis des bskul ma thag tu/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che/
19b3(mdo sde): bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra
19b4(mdo sde): mdzad nas/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/
19b5(mdo sde): ra gang dag dad pa sa dang zhing snod du gyur pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge snyen ma dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung
19b6(mdo sde): gsal ba'i sgra de thos nas lus dang / sems tshim par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus ji ltar byung ba'i them skas dag nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'khor gyi khyam
19b7(mdo sde): rin po che bkod par phyin te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs cig tu ji ltar 'thun pa'i stan dag la 'khod do// gsung gsal/
19b8(mdo sde): ba'i sgra de nyid kyis tshangs pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chen dang / 'od chung dang /
20a1(mdo sde): tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras
20a2(mdo sde): bu che dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang bskal nas
20a3(mdo sde): skad cig yud tsam de la 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par phyin te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas stan rab tu brtan pa dag la
20a4(mdo sde): 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'dus pa chen po de mkhyen nas/ smin 'tshams kyi mdzod spu nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs nye bar ston pa zhes bya ba'i
20a5(mdo sde): 'od zer phyung te/ des thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de nyid kyi spyi bor mi
20a6(mdo sde): snang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i 'od des reg ma thag tu/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus
20a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad bkod pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams
20a8(mdo sde): cang la dbang sgyur ba byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad bkod pa ma snyoms par zhugs pa thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bdan
20b1(mdo sde): pa'i dbus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khri'i 'phang du shing ta la bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgya bcu cam du bzo' ba/ rin pa che thams cad kyi smras pa/
20b2(mdo sde): kha khyer rgyan thams cad las byas pa/ ras bkod pa thams cad gting ba/ me tog sel ma sna tshogs thams cad bkram pa/ bA re ying du 'ong ba thams cad bres pa/
20b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i lus thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba/ 'khor thams cad kyi mig gis ltas pa// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston
20b4(mdo sde): pa/ bsam pa tshim par byed pa zhig byung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
20b5(mdo sde): gangan seng ge'i khri chen po bskul bar bsngags pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba mngon par sprul nas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs ste/ gus pa dang
20b6(mdo sde): bcas shing / zhes dang bcas par thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'gro ba'i dgos pa rab du bgyid//
20b7(mdo sde): lha dbang gzi brjid yon tan sum cu brtsa gsum dga'// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas mthu'i yul gyis rna
20b8(mdo sde): bar 'phrul pa 'di// chos rnams mi g.yon ma mkha'i rang bzhin ya ma brla// sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bu chu'i zla 'dra zhing // rje med byed pa po dang tshor ba po med par/
21a1(mdo sde): mkhyen nas mgon pa 'dir ni rnam par sgrub pa stan/ bkad pa sems kyi dbang 'gro sems ni gzugs ci zin// rnam sgrung
21a2(mdo sde): thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin dbang du 'gro/ bkod pa thams cad 'dir ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'dra// rnams bsgrub bdag gis ma mchis gang na'ang gnas ma
21a3(mdo sde): mchis// gang gis sems rgyun ma mchis rang bzhin dag 'tshal ba/ de la blo bur gnas pa'i nyon mongs ma mchis so// rtog dang kun rtog yongs su rtog
21a4(mdo sde): la sems grol ba/ de ni sgyu ma'i rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs paston// sa stong rdul tsam mngon par 'phags pa ma mchis kyang // sa steng nor bu rin chen sna tshogs/
21a5(mdo sde): kun tu bston/ gdan gang bzhugs nas sems can bye ba 'dul 'gyur ba/ khyod kyi seng ge'i khri gdan rab mdzes bdag gis bgyis/ gdugs dang rgyal
21a6(mdo sde): mtshan mchog dang dar gyi phreng ba bsgreng // de ni gang du'ang 'gro ba ma mchis 'ong ma mchis/ khyod kyis gang nas chos rnams 'du ba mkhyen nas kyang //
21a7(mdo sde): sems can dam pa rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs ston// tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan legs shing shin tu bsrungs pa'i gsungs// 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa
21a8(mdo sde): bsod nams gzi brjid mang / bdag la thugs rtse'i slad du 'dzegs te gdan la bzhugs// na dang 'chi dang na ba gtsang ba'i chos ba shad gsol/ khyod la spem
21b1(mdo sde): bkur bkyi dang rtsol ni gzhan mang du/ na ba dag sems can 'di rnams phyogs bcud gnas lhag/ gang gi don du zhugs pa'adan dbayul du gsas// mang nalan
21b2(mdo sde): la bzhugs te chos kyang bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i
21b3(mdo sde): lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa bsnyes nas/ byang chub sem
21b4(mdo sde): dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas// nges par 'byung ba bsgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa la dmigs pa dang //
21b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang / ye shes kyi 'byung gnas chos thams cad la
21b6(mdo sde): dbang bsgyur ba'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug pa so sor yang dag par rig pa la rnam par gtan la phab pa la gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa// mngon par shes
21b7(mdo sde): pa chen po'i ye shes gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo mi skye ba'i chos ston pa/ theg pa thams cad theg pa cig tu mnyam pa nyid du yang
21b8(mdo sde): dag par 'du ba/ chos kyi dbyings tshul cig cing ma 'dres pa la 'jug pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po la 'jug pa ston pa snying po dang
22a1(mdo sde): @ldan pa/ chos rnam par mi zag bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa/ tshul bzhin gyis chos kyi tshul la
22a2(mdo sde): gzhol bar 'jug pa/ nyon mongs pa dang lta bar gyur pa thams cad 'dul ba/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa/ thug pa med par ye shes yongs
22a3(mdo sde): su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i thabs dang ye shes ston pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la 'jug pa/ chags pa med pa'i byin gyi brlabs
22a4(mdo sde): kyi sgor 'jug pa/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par nges ston pa/ rtog pa med pa/ rnam par rtog pa med pa mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa/ bsod nams dang /
22a5(mdo sde): ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo mnyam pa nyid rtogs par byed pa// sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
22a6(mdo sde): thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan dang ldan pa dran pa dang blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa dang / shes rab mi shes pa mngon par sgrub pa/ nyan thos kyi
22a7(mdo sde): theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i tshul la 'jug pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir lus dang / ngag dang sems rab tu dben par shes
22a8(mdo sde): pa theg pa chen po 'dul ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sar dbang bskur ba rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad brjod pa'i phyir/
22b1(mdo sde): chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i tshul la 'jug pa'i dag bu'i chos kyi rnam thangs sang dag par rab tu bstan pa dang / bslang ba dang / gang bdag / stan
22b2(mdo sde): dang gsung ba dang / rnam par shes par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su bskang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam
22b3(mdo sde): par sprul pa yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'khor gyi the tsom thams cad gcad pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad char gcang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
22b4(mdo sde): bstan pa 'bar bya dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa chen po yongs su thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus
22b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rin chen srog shing zhes bya bas/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sgom par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
22b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sgra sgrogs stobs kyi rgyal pos pad ma bkod pa zhes bya
22b7(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi lag pa rnams su me tog gi lda ldi dag dang me tog gi skon bu rnams byin gyi brlabs te/
22b8(mdo sde): me tog gi lnga ldi dang me rtog gi skon bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la mngon par 'thor ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus
23a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' blo mchog rgya mtshos dri bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la spobs par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khon
23a2(mdo sde): gyi glu'i khung bu thams cad du tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri byin gyi brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dra ba can gyi 'od bkod pa
23a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la lus kyi 'od mtha' yas pa'i byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas
23a4(mdo sde): kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po sems pas mig mi 'dzum pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor de bzhin
23a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs shing / mig mi 'dzum par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' blo mtha' yas dri med kyi chos
23a6(mdo sde): la mchog tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chos don du gnyer zhing chos la dga' ba dang / mos par byin
23a7(mdo sde): gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pas rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
23a8(mdo sde): nas thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor sgrib pa snga rnam par sel bar byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rnab par 'phrul
23b1(mdo sde): pa'i rgyam pa brjod pa meng par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i// nga ladzin pa mas par zhugs nas/ thams cad du lda pa na sa na
23b2(mdo sde): pa la dmigs pa mi brjed par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos zil gyi mi non pa zhes bya
23b3(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi
23b4(mdo sde): mthus byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'joms pas bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te/
23b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'joms pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'jom pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum
23b6(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten khams na bdud bye ba phrag brgya ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dpung dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ myur ba myur bar rings
23b7(mdo sde): su rang rang gi bdud kyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'ad
23b8(mdo sde): kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lha'i mchod pa rnam brgya stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas/ gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas/
24a1(mdo sde): par thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gsol ba 'tshal na/ bcom
24a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das chos bshad du gsol// bde bar gshegs po chos bshad du gsol// byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'dzem pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bdag cag
24a3(mdo sde): bdud kyi sug las 'dor zhing slan chad sems can rnams la mig gis mi brtsol bar 'gyur ba'i las mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la dbugs dbyung ba
24a4(mdo sde): tse la cig dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis te/ bdag cag chos nyan par bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud de dag dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir 'di
24a5(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po dag legs so// legs so// khyod bdud kyi las kyang bor la de bzhin gshegs pa la chos bshad par gsol ba yang
24a6(mdo sde): thob shig dang / de nyid khyed kyi bdud kyi lam thams cad las 'das pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i stobs
24a7(mdo sde): bskyed pa'i phyir ro// grogs po dag 'di lta ste dper na/ mun pa mun nag lo du mar bsags pa ni mar me cig gis med par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag de bzhin
24a8(mdo sde): du nyon mongs pa'i mun nag bskal pa brgyar bsags pa yang ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa cig gis med par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag 'di lta ste dper na zla ba'i
24b1(mdo sde): dkyi khor cig dang / zhesa'i dkyil 'khor cig dang / nor bu rin po che chen po gcig gis mun pa mun nag thams cad mam lo// grogs pa dag de bzhin du /
24b2(mdo sde): ba'i sems lhag mthong dang ldan pa cig gis mi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad sel to// grogs po dag de'i phyir khyed dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rim gyis mi shes
24b3(mdo sde): pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad bsal nas chos kyi snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba
24b4(mdo sde): 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul de bzhin gshegs
24b5(mdo sde): bas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / kun tu bstan pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas
24b6(mdo sde): nges par 'byung ba'i sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pa bzhed par the tshom ma mchis so// de ci'i
24b7(mdo sde): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das e ma byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'dus pa 'di ni che ba ste/ bcom ldan 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi
24b8(mdo sde): khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes chen pos rnam par rol pa phyogs bcur sgra sbags pa/ sems shin tu byang bar bgyis te/
25a1(mdo sde): dri ma mchis pa dang / rig pa dang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pa/
25a2(mdo sde): chos thams cad la dbang phyug gis dbang sgyur ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol du son pa/ thabs la mkhas pa thams cad las nges par skyes pa/
25a3(mdo sde): bdud kyi las dang rtsod pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad gsal baM/ bas kyi rgol ba dang / ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad rab tu 'dul ba tshig thams cad
25a4(mdo sde): rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang /
25a5(mdo sde): khrel yod pa dang / mos pa dang / gzungs dang / ye shes rab tu thob pa/ byin gyi brlabs thogs pa ma mchis shing spobs pa rgyun mi mchad pa/ sems can thams
25a6(mdo sde): cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma lags pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa/ 'khrul pa ma mchis par
25a7(mdo sde): kha nas mya mchis pa'i ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra dang skad la mkhas pa/ mi 'am ci dang / bya ka la bing ka dang / khrung khrung gi sgra dang / tshangs pa'i sgra
25b1(mdo sde): dbyangs can/ shin du bshes gnyen bgyis pas sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god pa dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i
25b2(mdo sde): lhag pa'i bsam pa can brtan zhing shin du gnas la/ mi g.yo zhing ji skad smra ba de bzhin du bgyid pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag par sgreng bar bgyid pa/ rdo rje ltar
25b3(mdo sde): sra zhing mi shigs pa'i khor yug lta bu smon pa ma mchis pa'i smon pa ma mchis pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ brtan cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo blta zhing rtogs par
25b4(mdo sde): ska ba la zhugs pa/ chad pa dang rtag pa'i mtha' gnyi ga dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang bag chags kyi 'tshams sbyor ba yang dag par gcad pa/ tshogs can
25b5(mdo sde): chen po'i tshogs kyi rgyal po yongs su 'gug pa/ ded dpon po bskal pa grangs med par chos dkon mchog gis bsod nams yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ sman
25b6(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa gzugs can ma lags pa'i nad bso bar bgyid pa/ seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ sna
25b7(mdo sde): bzhi rgyud dang spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la mi skrag pa mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos lus legs par brgyan pa
26a1(mdo sde): gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin bgyid pa/ thams cad la sems dpa' dang / bdud bzhi dang / nyon mongs pa'i yul
26a2(mdo sde): 'dul ba/ mnyam pa lta bur gyur pa/ dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge
26a3(mdo sde): 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa shin du yongs su sbyangs pa bgyis pa/ sems can thams cad rab tu sgrol ba brtson pa/ ri lta bur gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi
26a4(mdo sde): chos brgyad po rnyed pa/ ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / smad pa dang / bstod pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal las log par dga'
26a5(mdo sde): ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i chos la sems zhugs pa/ chos dkon mchog gi 'od zer dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyis ngoms nas ngoms par bgyi
26a6(mdo sde): pa pad ma lta bu 'du byas kyis tshogs thams cad kyis mi gos pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i 'od
26a7(mdo sde): mog mog bor bgyid pa/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ chos dkon mchog thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcod
26a8(mdo sde): ba/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin bgyid pa dang / 'dul ba'i cho ga 'tshal ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dkon mchog thams cad kyi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa/
26b1(mdo sde): bsngags pa mtha' yas pa dang / yang dag par ldan pa/ bsod nams tshad ma mchis pa bsags pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i
26b2(mdo sde): ye shes la nye bar gyur pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par bsngags pa/ mthar mi phyin pa 'di lta bu rnams kyis 'dus pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de la
26b3(mdo sde): bdag 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas/ nges par 'byung ba'i sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i
26b4(mdo sde): le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad bzhed pa snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni phan 'dogs par gyur pa/ sems can thams
26b5(mdo sde): cad tshim par 'gyur ba/ ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
26b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba/ spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul gcig la 'jug pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
26b7(mdo sde): rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos la dbang bskur ba/ skye bo cig gis thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu chud mi za ba/ nges pa'i sems
27a1(mdo sde): can rnams la rkyen nye bar bsgrub pa/ ma nges pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po nye bar bsgrub pa/ log pa nyid du nges
27a2(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams 'dzud pa/ theg pa gsum la mos pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par dgod pa ston pa ste ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung
27a3(mdo sde): ba ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi brgyan lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung bar gyur na/
27a4(mdo sde): ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'di lta bu 'di dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis 'khor gyi khyams 'dir sems
27a5(mdo sde): bskyed pa cig gos 'god pa gang byin gyis brlabs pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang ston pa'i rngo mi thog go
27a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid de/ e ma ji tsam du gang rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong yang nyan thos kyi theg pa
27a7(mdo sde): bam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la rab bskyed pa'i sems can shes rab 'chal pa de dag ni ngo mtshar che ba snam bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
27b1(mdo sde): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po skyeng pa nyid kyis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis non pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das/
27b2(mdo sde): 'di lta steng bar na/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can gyi mi la la zhig nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya bor nas/ nor bu 'ching bu la dmigs pa snyam du sems
27b3(mdo sde): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gang dag theg pa chen po bor nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs par bgyid du sems dpa'i sems
27b4(mdo sde): can dag ni 'dra ba nyid du bdag gda'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
27b5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / skyed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni ring por mi thogs par chos 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// byang chub
27b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'khor de las srog chags bye ba khrag wa~M/
27b7(mdo sde): phrag sum bcus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do// brgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba/ 'dus pa'i le'u'o//
28a1(mdo sde): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po de gzigs nas/ e ma byang chub sems dpa'
28a2(mdo sde): 'dus pa 'di dag ni chos don du gnyer ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin par mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas
28a3(mdo sde): nges par 'byung ba/ sgrib pa med pa'i sgo'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu bshad pa'i phyir/ mi 'jig pas spobs pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer skyes bu chen
28a4(mdo sde): chen po'i mtshan spyi gtsug nas phyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer de phyung ma thag tu/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems pa'i tshogs la lan
28a5(mdo sde): bdun bskor ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' bzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i lus la lan brgyar bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi
28a6(mdo sde): dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i spyi gtsug du ma snang bar gyur to// 'od des byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la reg ma thag du/ de nas sangs rgyas/
28a7(mdo sde): mthus/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i rmogs kyi 'od dang / seng ge'o khri dang / lus brgya lu
28a8(mdo sde): du zil gyis mnan nas/ lham me/ lhan ne'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs pa
28b1(mdo sde): rig nas/ stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su
28b2(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang zad kyi steng gi bar snang la rin po che'i gdugs de bzhin gshegs pa'i brgyan ces bya ba yu ba ni
28b3(mdo sde): baiDUH/ g.yogs ma ni gser/ snying po rin po che ni tse 'am ci/ rtsibs ni an da spel las byas pa/ mu tig gi do shal rab tu sbyangs pa/ dar gyi lda ldis mdzed
28b4(mdo sde): par byas pa/ dril bu g.yer ga'i dra bas 'khrol ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyis bzung ba/ rgyar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad
28b5(mdo sde): tsam zhig byin gyis brlabs so// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ rin po che'i gdugs de lta bu byin gyi brlabs nas/ me tog gi char yang bang
28b6(mdo sde): ste/ sil snyan dang / sgra dbyangs rtag tu rgyun mi mchad par sgra 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par
28b7(mdo sde): stod do// kun tu snang ba kun nas 'od zer can// don rnams ma lus ston pa kun nas spyan// rang 'byung chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas// bsam gyis mi khyab yon
28b8(mdo sde): tan kun dang ldan skyes bu khyu mchog gis ni 'od zer phyung // zhal yang rnam par sbyong zhing 'od mdzad pa// 'dren pa des ni bdag gis lus la yang // lan brgyar
29a1(mdo sde): bskor ba bgyis nas spyi bor ni/ mi'i 'dren pa 'od kyis rig pas na// gang dag bdag gis sngon thob dran pa dang // thogs nga/
29a2(mdo sde): pa snang ba de bzhin gzungs/ rnam pa stong du khyad par 'phags par 'gyur// bdag lus rab sim sems ni rnam par dag/ bdag gis blo gros dga' 'gur mnyam
29a3(mdo sde): par gyur// gzhan yang sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtha' yas dang / spobs pa bdag gi lus la rab tu zhugs// sangs rgyas mthu chen bsnyed par dka' ba la/
29a4(mdo sde): nyam chung dag gis mnyes par byed mi nus// sangs rgyas gnang nas 'gro kun phan slad du// sangs rgyas la ni zhu ba zhus pas 'tshal// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems
29a5(mdo sde): dpa'i spyod pa 'jug/ 'jig rten rnam 'dren dag gis 'byung ba dang // snang dang nges 'byung rnam par sprul pa dang // dbang bskur ye shes yongs su zhu bar 'tshal/
29a6(mdo sde): theg mchog dam pa rtogs par khang chung cing // mtha' yas rgya che ba'i 'khor lhags dang / gang dag rgya chen chos don gnyer bdag/ de dag pa ni spad sangs rgyas
29a7(mdo sde): la yang nu/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor shin du tshar bcad cing // sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di ni shin tu bzung // bcom ldan phung po ma mchis dam chos mdzod/
29a8(mdo sde): lum can rnams sa bshad pa'i dus 'di lags// skyes bu khyu mchog mkhyen pa lapa' yas pas// bcom ldan de ma bdag gi bla ma rung // bde gshegs sa che
29b1(mdo sde): pa shes pas mi dpogs pas// mkhas pa yang dag pa ni nu bar 'tshal// ji ltar bcom ldan khyod kyis mkhyen 'jug dang // ji ltar yun ring nas ni bslabs pa
29b2(mdo sde): dang chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po rab brlabs pa// 'dren pa rnams kyi spyod yul bshad du gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi
29b3(mdo sde): rgyal pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
29b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ni tshad ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gsheg
29b5(mdo sde): pa ni yongs su mi skyo bar chos ston pa lags par rig cing / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i thugs rje chen po la gnas par
29b6(mdo sde): mthong nas don 'di zhu bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan dag ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sem
29b7(mdo sde): dpa' brgyan gang dag gis brgyan gang dag gis brgyan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na mdzes pa lags// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na
29b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyis dang babasam gyis mi khyab pa thos nas/ gti mug gi sun pa dang bral zhing / the tshom ma mchis pa dang / chos kyin
30a1(mdo sde): chen po shin du yongs su sbyangs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mi gtong /
30a2(mdo sde): ba'i snying rje chen po dang / snying rje chen po la gnas pa mchog dang ldan zhing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji
30a3(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag pa la zhugs pa dang / legs par bgyid pa'i las kyi mtha' gdung ba ma mchis pa
30a4(mdo sde): rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom zhing the tshom dang bral nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul
30a5(mdo sde): la 'jug par gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yul la 'jug par 'phags par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba
30a6(mdo sde): dang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dag yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang /
30a7(mdo sde): bdud kyi dkyil 'khor tshar bcod par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / myur du chos thams cad la/
30a8(mdo sde): dbang po thob par 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pas blo shin tu rnam par nges pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas mngon par 'phags pa'i
30b1(mdo sde): chos kyi sgo de legs par bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal bas
30b2(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so// khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul tshad med pa la rnam par gdon mi za ba thob
30b3(mdo sde): nas khyod blo rnam par gdon mi za ba 'di lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so// de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod
30b4(mdo sde): shin tu legs par nyon la yid la bzung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yon tan 'di dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
30b5(mdo sde): yon tan tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / myur du chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba thob par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la
30b6(mdo sde): bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' bzungs kyi dbang phyug gis rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te// bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan
30b7(mdo sde): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste bzhi gang zhe na 'di
30b8(mdo sde): lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi brgyan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi brgyan dang / shes rab kyi brgyan dang / gzungs kyi brgyan dang / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
31a1(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi brgyan bzhi po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi brgyan
31a2(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi brgyan cig ste/ gcig gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la
31a3(mdo sde): gnod pa mi byed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang ba'i sems med pa ni sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di
31a4(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi brgyan gcig go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di
31a5(mdo sde): dag dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ ngan 'gro'i sgo bcod pa dang / bde 'gro'i sgo 'byed pa ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang
31a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi brgyan ni 'di dag ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste lus rnam par dag pa dang / ngag rnam par dag pa
31a7(mdo sde): dang yid rnam par dag pa ste/ gsum po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/
31a8(mdo sde): bzhi po gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ gang 'dod pa de 'byor pa dang / gang smon pa de yang ya dag par 'grub pa dang / gang 'dod pa de thob pa dang / gang
31b1(mdo sde): brtsom pa de rnams 'og tu chud par byed pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi brgyan ni lnga po 'dzi
31b2(mdo sde): dag ste// lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgyu med pa yin/ shes rab sgyu med pa yin/ rnam par grol ba sgyu
31b3(mdo sde): med pa yin/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba sgyu med pa yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bla na med pa sgyu med pa yin te/
31b4(mdo sde): po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi brgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yid la
31b5(mdo sde): cags pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir skyon med pa'i tshul khrims dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir nyams pa med pa'i tshul khrims
31b6(mdo sde): dang 'dres pa ma yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir 'dres pa ma yin pa'i tshul khrims dang / dge ba'i chos shin tu rnam par 'phel ba'i phyir sra sre ma yin
31b7(mdo sde): pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir rang dga'i tshul khrims dang / gzhan la rag ma las pa'i shes pas rang gis dbang sgyur ba'i tshul khrims te drug po 'di
31b8(mdo sde): dgago/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi brgyan ni bdun po 'di dag te/ bdun gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dpa
32a1(mdo sde): @ldan pa'i sbyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / bzod pa rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa dang / bsam
32a2(mdo sde): gtan rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab rnam par dag pa dang / thabs rnam par dag pa dang / bag yod pa rnam par dag pa ste/ bdun po 'di dag go
32a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi brgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
32a4(mdo sde): sa phun sum tshogs pa dang / rnam par 'phro ba med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / lhod pa med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / khon du 'dzin pa med pa phun
32a5(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mgu
32a6(mdo sde): bar byed pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/ brgyad po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi brgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgu
32a7(mdo sde): gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'jigs pa med pa yin/ skrag pa med pa yin/ bsam pa med pa yin/ nye ba re zhi ba yin/ bsil ba yin/ bcings pa
32a8(mdo sde): stong pa yin/ sems las su rung ba yin/ sems cad shes pa yin/ dul ba'i sa rjes su thob pa yin te/ dgu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byung
32b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi brgyan ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ mtshan dang dpe byed bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/
32b2(mdo sde): lus kyi brgyan dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa'i phyir ngag gi brgyan dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir sems kyi brgyan dang / smon lam yongs
32b3(mdo sde): su rdzogs pa'i phyir zhing gi brgyan dang / bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i brgyan dang / sdig pa thams cad mi
32b4(mdo sde): byed pa'i phyir skye ba'i brgyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa la rjes su slob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i brgyan dang / nga rgyal
32b5(mdo sde): med pa'i phyir shes pa'i brgyan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir byang chub kyi snying pa'i brgyan dang / tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba la gnas pa
32b6(mdo sde): mi 'dor ba'i phyir/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i brgyan yin te/ rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub
32b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi brgyan no// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi brgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang /
32b8(mdo sde): nub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi brgyan ni gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la byams pa ste/ 'di ni cig go//
33a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi brgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe na 'dis sku
33a2(mdo sde): dran pa dang mnyan po ste gnyis po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dag ste/ gsum gang zhe na/
33a3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ rgyu med pa dang / g.yo med pa dang / bcos pa med pa ste/ gsum po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi
33a4(mdo sde): rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang /
33a5(mdo sde): gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba ste/ bzhi po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub
33a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi brgyan ni lnga po 'di dag ste// lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sgrib pa lnga spong ba ste/ lnga po gang zhe na/ 'dod pa la 'dun
33a7(mdo sde): pa dang / gnod sems dang rmugs pa dang / gnyid dang rgod pa dang / 'gyod pa dang the tshom ste/ sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag ning mtsha/ rigs kyi bu
33a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes
33b1(mdo sde): su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su drar pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa nye drug pa 'di dag go// rags
33b2(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag ste/ bdun po gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems mi rjed pa'i byang chub
33b3(mdo sde): kyi yan lag bdun sgom pa ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rab tu 'jed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang
33b4(mdo sde): dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang
33b5(mdo sde): dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ bdun po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams
33b6(mdo sde): kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad po gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po bsgom pa ste/ 'di ltar yang dag
33b7(mdo sde): pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtogs pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tshe ba dang / yang dag
33b8(mdo sde): ba'i brtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin
34a1(mdo sde): gyi brgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brjed pa med pa'i
34a2(mdo sde): sems kyis snying rje chen po'i gnas la gnas te/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas nas/ 'dod pa dag la dben pa/ sdig pa mi
34a3(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ spyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po
34a4(mdo sde): rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rtog pa dang spyod pa bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud cig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ spyod pa med pa/ ting
34a5(mdo sde): nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas ste gnas so// de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas/ btang
34a6(mdo sde): snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang / shes pa bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la
34a7(mdo sde): gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o// zhes thong ba ste/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug
34a8(mdo sde): bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ btang snyoms dran pa yangs
34b1(mdo sde): su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/
34b2(mdo sde): thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas na/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha'
34b3(mdo sde): mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mches las yang dag par 'das te rnam par shes pa
34b4(mdo sde): mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag
34b5(mdo sde): par 'das te ci'ang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag
34b6(mdo sde): par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched
34b7(mdo sde): las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang / thabs mkhas pas yang dag pa'i mtha'
34b8(mdo sde): mngon gsum du'ang mi byed la/ sngon gyi byin gyi brlabs kyi yang dag par gnas/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni
35a1(mdo sde): dgu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi brgyan bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
35a2(mdo sde): mi 'khrugs pas nges par sems pa dang / zhi gnas yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mngon par brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang / nang du yang dag 'jog sbeng dang /
35a3(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud mi ba dang / sems dben pa dang / lus shin du spangs pa dang / chos rnams la sems shing 'jams la so sor rtog pa dang / sems
